title: A few T206 HOFers and others
author: Kenny Cole

posts.post_title: A few T206 HOFers and others
posts.post_content:
Check or paypal gift please.  

Wheat -- $140
Reulbach (glove) - $60
Reulbach (no glove) - $45
Chase - sold
Kelley - $90
Huggins - $100
Bender - sold
Dineen - sold
Phillippe - $35

Kenny,

I will take the Chase.  Please let me know where to send the check.

Best Regards,

Eric
